name: Gin Rummy
description: Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Go Gin! Play Gin Rummy, one of the most internationally beloved of all card games!  Enjoy challenging variations of the classic game, including Hollywood Gin, Oklahoma Gin and many more.  Customize your game with an array of colorful themes, unique decks and entertaining tunes.  Knock out players from around the world in a real-time multiplayer match and video chat through Xbox LIVE Vision with up to 4 people. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
